title: Mana regen+ Armor
body:
another thread had me thinking, why don't we have a Mana regen+ Armor item? It would be the perfect counter to insta kill Zeds and Talons so they don't invalidate your immobile squishy mage who is forced to buy a zhonyas first while going OOM because they can't buy any mana regen above an idol (unless your opponent is an idiot who gave you a kill).

What do you think?

replies.body: After you get Zhonyas just start working towards Morello's or something. Although it would be nice if we had an armor and mana regen item.

> [{quoted}](name=Prospector Pete,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NmEWpp5A,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-17T12:54:13.074+0000)
>
> After you get Zhonyas just start working towards Morello's or something. Although it would be nice if we had an armor and mana regen item.

And by time youve finished building both, zed has roamed bot lane twice while you are now able to shove the lane with spells.

Having mana problems when laning against Zed and Talon?

Get a second Doran's Ring or a Tear of the Goddess.

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NmEWpp5A,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-17T12:45:01.289+0000)
>
> Having mana problems when laning against Zed and Talon?
> 
> Get a second Doran's Ring or a Tear of the Goddess.

When you're playing a champion like lux or orianna, a second ring will not help you. Getting a tear will only prolong your zhonyas rush which is crucial against talon and especially zed who will delete you otherwise. 

That's why a armor+manareg item would be a huge help.
Ive also thought about such an Item, like maybe built out of Glacial Shroud and Idol or something like that. This is an issue I saw all the time with the Seekers Rush.

{{item:3024}} + {{item:3114}} feels more like a item you would want to buy on a support. Since it doesn't give you mana I don't think it will ever become something viable.

What about {{item:3024}} + {{item:1026}} 

* Unique Passive: Gains 20 armor for 5 seconds while below 20% of your maximum health.

This would help them against burst AD but not against poke AD. It can also be viable for certain AP tanks
It would be really good and would help immobile mages against AD assassins or any AD comp since they don't have many items to buy against them.

I do like the concept though. Though the passive is a tad awkward, you're kinda getting rewarded for getting hit. I dunno what word to say for that...rewarded or compensated? 

Either way, ideas are always welcome. :)
That passive's numbers probably aren't ideal. I just thought it up on a whim to give the item a passive.

_**Watchers' Vambrace**_

_Seeker's Armguard (1200) + Forbidden Idol (600) + Amplifying Tome (435) + 565 = 2800_

+60 Ability Power (1305)
+45 Armor (900)
+100% Base Mana Regen (720)
+10% Cooldown Reduction (317)

Unique Passive: Whenever you take Physical Damage from an enemy champion, you regain Mana equal to 4 + 1% of your Missing Health (halved against basic attacks). This effect cannot occur more than ? times every ? seconds.

_Stat Value: 3242
Stat/Gold Efficiency: ~116% 
(Athene's: 117% Stat/Gold Efficiency)_

This needs more discussion! We need a blue involved. 

Zed and talon mains need to upvote this btw. If mage mains receive this, you can stop being nerfed.

Maybe not a mid-tier item, but it definitely would be really good on a completed item.

Something with a build along the lines of Armguard + Idol and has AP, Armor, Mana regen, and CDR would definitely be good against those kinds of champions.

Armor + mana is something we already have on a mid-tier item with Glacial Shroud, so I don't think we should crowd that out with a mid-tier mana regen + armor item.

it would give more diversity to some items

could be built from {{item:3191}}  + {{item:3028}}
I'm in for it.It would really help immobile mages out and reduce the dominance of AD assassins.
